main: ^One of your passengers is looking a little pale.
^"I feel sick, like I'm gonna puke." Knowing that the speed stomach of contents averages at about 30-40 cm/s, you realize the weight of the situation and have to act fast.
FirstChoice: ^They quickly open the window, letting their stomach loose into the wind. It's a gross thought to dwell on but at least none of it got into the car (the smell did though). (PARTY happiness -2)
SecondChoice: ^You pull over to the side of the road, and not a second too soon as the next thing you hear is about 43 seconds of retching, 15 seconds of suppressed crying, a couple of emotes, and a "thug it out" to end on a high note. Back on the road! (PARTY happiness -1)
ThirdChoice: ^The boogie bomb in their stomach worked a little quicker than the digestive system versus some Pepto in the time it took for you to pull over, but it did help the aftermath. (PARTY happiness +2, medicine -1)
